charges.charge_description: 18:1951.F; 18:1951 and 2 - INTERFERENCE WITH COMMERCE BY THREAT OR VIOLENCE-Robbery(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: CBOP:350 Months. 230 months as to Cts 1 &; 3 to run concurrently and 120 months on Ct 2 to run consecutively to any other term. S/R 5 years. This term consists of 3 years on each of Cts. 1 and 3 and 5 years on Ct. 2, all such terms to run concurrently. S/A $300. No Fine. Restitution in the amount of $31,118.32 jointly and severally.
